project_descr: Emergency Response to Influenza Outbreak in Ukraine

outputs.output_descr: Emergency Response Center (ERC) established to enable a better coordination of emergency situations, ensure needs assessment, emergency preparedness and response, assist the Government of Ukraine in coordination of international community's assistance. A comprehensive response plan is developed to assist the Government of Ukraine in disaster prevention, preparedness and response. Government has resources to ensure effective social communication in emergency situations/fighting influenza outbreaks. Government supported as necessary in effective logistical and technical services in emergency situations/fighting the influenza outbreak.

document_name: http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/UKR/00058719/Final_Report_2011_Emergency Response to Influenza Outbreak in Ukraine.docx
project_title: emergency response to influenza outbreak in ukraine
